step_feedback.feedback: Good job starting comfortably. Keep your hands on your abdomen as instructed.
You are maintaining a comfortable position. Remember to place hands on your abdomen.
Great inhale! Focus on tightening your whole body muscles and visualizing fluid moving to your chest.
Excellent exhale and relaxation. Visualize pushing fluid out as you breathe out.
Good start for the second repetition. Ensure your hands are placed on your abdomen.
You're maintaining a good position. Keep your hands on your abdomen.
Well done with the inhale and muscle tightening. Visualize the fluid moving towards your chest.
Fantastic exhale and relaxation. Keep visualizing pushing fluid out as you breathe.

exercise_summary: You did a great job with the deep breathing exercise! Remember to keep your hands on your abdomen throughout, and focus on tightening your body muscles during inhales and relaxing during exhales. Visualize the fluid movement as instructed to maximize the benefits.
